data.Title: Google Search Console Performance Reports Experiencing Delays
data.Description: Google Search Console performance reports have been delayed for an unusually long period, exceeding 60 hours. Google is aware of the issue and working on a fix.

data.Title: Google Updates Merchant Center Conversion Data Usage Policy
data.Description: Google Merchant Center merchants received notifications about a change in how Google collects and uses conversion data. Google may use this data for new reporting and to improve Google Search.

data.Title: Google Search Ranking AI-Generated Spam Above Original Reporting
data.Description: A concerning trend has emerged where Google Search is ranking AI-generated spam content above original reporting in news results.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews Decline as Study Shows Correlation with Drop in Mobile Searches
data.Description: A recent study suggests that Google's AI overviews coincided with a decline in mobile search volume, prompting Google to potentially scale back the feature.

data.Title: YouTube Updates Policy to Allow Takedown Requests for AI-Generated Content Simulating Faces and Voices
data.Description: YouTube's policy change enables individuals to request the removal of AI-generated content that simulates their face or voice through the platform's privacy request process.

data.Title: Bing Introduces "Prompt Injection" Guideline to Webmaster Guidelines
data.Description: Bing has added a new guideline to its Bing Webmaster Guidelines addressing "Prompt Injection," a cyberattack targeting large language models (LLMs) by manipulating generative AI systems.

data.Title: Google Search to Allow Ads for Daily Fantasy Sports and Lottery Couriers in Several States
data.Description: Google Ads will now permit advertisements for Daily Fantasy Sports and lottery courier services in numerous states.

data.Title: Google Ads Implements New Setting for Disclosing "Altered or Synthetic Content"
data.Description: Google Ads introduces a new setting requiring advertisers to disclose the use of "Altered or synthetic content" in their ads.

data.Title: Google Search Testing "Top Quality Store" Badge
data.Description: Google Search is experimenting with a "Top Quality Store" badge displayed next to the site name in search results.

data.Title: Google Explains the Negative Impact of Soft 404 Errors on Websites
data.Description: Google's Gary Illyes explains why soft 404 errors are detrimental to websites, highlighting their impact on crawl budget and search visibility.

data.Title: Google's July 2024 Webmaster Report Highlights
data.Description: The July 2024 Google Webmaster Report covers significant events, including the June Spam Update, AI Overviews, an indexing bug, and the completion of mobile-first indexing.

data.Title: Google Local Service Ads Now Appear in Mobile Search's Local Business Finder Results
data.Description: Google Local Service Ads have been integrated into the local business finder results within Google's mobile search.

data.Title: Microsoft Advertising Launches New Property Center
data.Description: Microsoft Advertising has introduced a new Property Center.
